name: Game Gremlins
description:
They ain't any old bug or glitch, they're Game Gremlins, pesky digital critters that tamper with software and cause havoc! 

Unfortunately for you, your PC copy of "Damien Doski's Super Shootout" has been invaded by those little vermin! It's up to you to get rid of these nasty gremlins before they eat up your game files and save data!

  • Use your mouse to aim and the space bar to shoot!
  • Beware of the gremlins and their nasty tricks!
  • Get rid of all the gremlins you can!

(I had to make the game in 6 days (instead of 14 days) due to my schedule so sorry if you think it's bad)
